sentences.en: An overdose of sun, sea, sand and chlorine can give lighter hair a green tinge.
sentences.cn: 过量接触阳光、海水、沙粒和氯气会使浅色头发略呈绿色。

sentences.en: Antidote for overdose application: emetic, cathartic, alkalescent foods and beverages.
sentences.cn: 服用过量时所需用的解毒剂: 催吐, 泻药, 弱碱性食品、饮料.

sentences.en: Fatal hyperphosphatemia after oral phosphate overdose in a premature infant.
sentences.cn: 1例早产婴儿口服过量磷酸盐引起致命性高磷血症.

sentences.en: He died of a horse overdose.
He took an overdose and was in the hospital for weeks.
sentences.cn: 他用药过量,在医院住了好几个星期.

sentences.en: I am not kidding; all overdose of this drug really can kill.
sentences.cn: 翻译我不是开玩笑, 过量使用该药的确会致命.

sentences.en: In case of accidental overdose, contact a poison control center immediately.
sentences.cn: 万一过量服用, 请立刻联系医生.

sentences.en: Medical opinion varies on how many tablets it takes to overdose.
sentences.cn: 医生对于服用多少药片算作过量意见不一。

sentences.en: Quick! John! It's Carmela. I think she's taken an overdose.
sentences.cn: 快来！约翰！卡梅拉出事了，我想她用药过量了。

sentences.en: She took an overdose and died two days later.
sentences.cn: 她服药过量，两天后死了。

sentences.en: She took an overdose of sleeping pills.
The autopsy revealed that Kevin had died from a heroine overdose.
sentences.cn: 我赶忙将他送进急诊室,但他在当天晚上就宣告不治.

sentences.en: The investigation began after a student overdose at the fraternity house.
sentences.cn: 这次调查是在一名学生被发现在联谊会会堂吸食过量毒品而后展开的.

sentences.en: The woman was treated for a possible amitriptyline overdose.
sentences.cn: 这位妇女可能曾用过量的阿米替林治疗.

sentences.en: To get their own bread they must overdose the king's lieges.
sentences.cn: 为了多挣一些钱,他们不惜对英王的臣民用药过量.

sentences.en: Whatever happens, never take an overdose of this medicine.
sentences.cn: 这种药千万不能服过量.

words.tran_cn: 过分打扮的；穿着过于讲究的
超速档；[机] 超速传动
穿得过分讲究；穿得过多
过分夸大；过分戏剧性地表达
过度装饰；使穿著过分讲究
驱使过度；虐待；工作过度

trans.tran_en: too much of a drug taken at one time
to take too much of a drug at one time, so that it harms you or kills you
